name: Dirty Revolver
description:
Live an uninterrupted story of revenge in the Wild West!

During your childhood, Wesley's men had shot the whole village and killed your mother and your siblings. Your wounded father was only able to save you and left the city and trained you on the mountain for many years. With the death of your father, it's time for revenge.

Game Features
* 4 different cities
* Different weather conditions. (rain, snow, sunny, storm, etc.)
* Wide variety of atmospheres (desert life, snowy hills, green plateaus, etc.)
* Possibility to customize your character with dozens of different outfits
* Hundreds of different missions
* Wild West weapons with various perks
* A variety of enemies with different strengths
* Possibility to fight on horseback or on foot
* Story-driven gameplay that doesn't require internet.

Enjoy uninterrupted action with bandits in city, field, and difficult weather conditions with realistic map designs in third person (tps).

For game graphics to work as intended, we recommend iphone 7 and above.
publishers: DREAMBOX MARKA ILETISIM VE REKLAM HIZMETLERI ANONIM SIRKETI
